example.description: A cat that looks like a snake or a snake that looks like a cat, scientists still argue. A friendly animal, but has a powerful poison, sharp claws. Loves warming in the sun, confined spaces and silence.
example.experiment_info: In battle, stands on its hind legs and hits with its front legs. At this moment, his weak point is visible - the belly. Ranged Attack: Spits poison, over long distances.
